comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: J. C. Wheatley and H. Knecht were competitive swimmers See , for example, NYT March 23, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=980DE6D7133BE633A...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The swimming and diving photos in this batch may be related to the event reported in NYT, August 24, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=990CE1DD123FE633A... Wheatley, Rex Cropsey, and Knecht took the first, second, and third places in the 200 yard swim.
